website_summaries.verdict: The best budget fire blanket to keep around when you need a little bit of protection while on the go.
pros: Folds up into a small pouch that can fit into tight spaces like pockets, cars, and closets
Capable of handling various types of fires, including oil and grease fires

customer_reviews.title: Works, but slow to put out fires.
customer_reviews.text: Our household continues the annual tradition of setting the kitchen on fire in various novel ways. This time the culprit is avocado oil on a cast iron pan. No injuries reported. The good: - Yanking out the blanket was smooth and easy - the fire was eventually smothered. The bad: - the black strap immediately detached when pulling, so I had to pry out the blanket from the bag - the blanket melted through partially and let air in - blanket is not very pliable, so getting airtight seal was a little hard Tips for fellow buyers: - keep these mounted on a wall within easy reach. - be careful, blanket heats up rapidly
customer_reviews.author: Vania Smirnov

customer_reviews.title: Conceptually excellent
customer_reviews.text: This is a little like trying to rate life insurance - I've never tested it and hope I never do. I showed it to a friend who is a fire chief and he say a blanket like this is the best way to fight a kitchen fire. It will smother the fire with no mess and also puts a fireproof barrier between you and the fire.
customer_reviews.author: James S.

customer_reviews.title: Had a kitchen fire. This blanket saved the day ...
customer_reviews.text: Had a kitchen fire. This blanket saved the day. Purchased two more. Suggest this blanket be in everyone's kitchen
customer_reviews.author: Paul Schiffman

customer_reviews.title: making sure I was happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Just received 2 Fire Blankets. I ordered the 39x39 size for our kitchen. It's the exact some fire blanket our local fire department showed us at a demonstration, so I was impressed with that. I pray we never have to use it! Received an email from the company, making sure I was happy with my purchase. That was impressive, not many companies that the time to do that. I most assuredly recommend buying from Tonyko!
customer_reviews.author: S. Cole

customer_reviews.title: Loose fiberglass!!
customer_reviews.text: This item is of bad quality, as soon as I opened and handled the product, the tiny needle like fiber glass pierced into my hands, so thin and so clear I cannot see, upon feeling something's pricked into my skin, I took a closer look at the blanket, my God there's so so so many loose fiberglass sticking out! had to endure a lot of pain to find them and rub them off of my hands, now I don't know if there's any on my clothes, how am I going to hold my baby with the clothes I'm wearing. Just imagine if you breathe in this stuff into your lungs. Returning immediately out of pure fear.
customer_reviews.author: Heng Chen

customer_reviews.title: Love these blankets
customer_reviews.text: The blanket is very compact and easy to use. If you were in a serious situation where a fire has spread, this blanket wrapped around you would help prevent burns trying to exit. Small fire, can easily be thrown on top to be extinguished. My daughter has a hard time using fire extinguisher; I showed her how to use blanket which was much easier for her. So would recommend for small kids. This also very easier to store in any room, such as an small drawer instead of a can spray. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Um...no...don’t buy if you’re a fire spinner.
customer_reviews.text: Whoa...I should have been more careful when I bought this. The fiberglass shredded and was everywhere!!! I wasn’t paying attention when I bought it and thought it was like the other I had bought. If you’re a fire spinner stay away from this blanket. It’ll shred and get all over you and your props.. ugh.
customer_reviews.author: Love Light Laughter Healing

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: It's really hard to review this product without actually testing it. The shipping was a bit slow but for the price I paid, it was worth the wait. There are instructions printed on the package. Simply pull the 2 black straps down to release the blanket. I hope to never use this product but it's a good secondary device to have in addition to the fire extinguisher. If there is a fire and you have to use this product, call the fire department anyway. Once they confirm the fire is out, then discard this product. It's not meant for re-use.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Las Vegas

customer_reviews.title: Did a poor job of putting out a small fire.
customer_reviews.text: The blanket is not heavy enough to overcome its rigidity. As a result it does not really press down on the fire area, and there is plenty of room at the sides for air to get in and out. Had a fire in an oven. Applied blanket. Fire was suppressed, but was far from smothered. Blanket had no structural problems, hence the second star. Needs to be heavier so it presses down and helps create some sort of seal.

customer_reviews.title: Smells like moth balls

customer_reviews.title: It Really Works

I am not only buying a new one to replace the one I used, but plan to keep one on every level of my home. Great product that everyone should have on hand!

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it hoping that we'd never have to use, but, unfortunately, we had a stove fire approximately a week after it came it. I tried to put out the flames with a pot lid, but the flames were getting too big, and the smoke was starting to fill our apartment. I then grabbed the fire blanket, opened it, and threw it over the flames. It put the fire out almost immediately. After we got everything settled, I put in an order for several more. Now, every member of the family has one by their bed, and another one stays in the kitchen.

product_meta.title: Tonyko Fiberglass Fire Blanket for Emergency Surival, Flame Retardant Protection and Heat Insulation with Various Sizes
product_meta.description:
Features: 
This fire blanket is used to quench and resist fire spreading 
Used to extinguish various types of fire including both liquid and grease fire in office, warehouse, ship, car, construct, house, kitchen, restaurant, amusement building, gas station etc. 
Can be used simply without training.

Specifications: 
Material: Fiberglass cloth 
Temperature: Isolates high temperatures up to 1076℉ or 580℃
Size (length*width) : 39.3×39.3 Inches（1*1m）, 47.2×47.2 Inches（1.2*1.2m）, 59×59 Inches（1.5*1.5m）, 47.2×70.9 Inches（1.2*1.8m）, 70.9×70.9 Inches（1.8*1.8m）, 78.7×78.7 Inches（2*2m）
Included: 1 PACK Fire Blanket


Warm tips: 
1.It is recommended that adults use the size of 47.2×70.9 Inches（1.2*1.8m）, 70.9×70.9 Inches（1.8*1.8m）or 78.7×78.7 Inches（2*2m）.
feature_bullets: VARIOUS PLACES TO USE: Emergency survival fire blanket ideal for the kitchen, fireplace, grill, car, camping and so on
EXTINGUISH VARIOUS FIRES: Extinguish various types of fire by suffocating it, including liquid and grease fire
KEEP YOUR FAMILY SAFE: Can be used to wrap around your body and act as a heat shield
TIDY AFTER EXTINGUISHING FIRE: In contrast to fire extinguishers, the fire blanket can still keep the place tidy after extinguishing a fire
STANDARD: Meets EN-1869：1997 standard for cooking fire suppression; Included: 1 PACK Fire Blanket
